CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 2, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "At Beauty Shop Owners Tea - Glamour hats shown at the Beauty Shop Owners' tea Sunday were created at the Hannah Chapeax Shop and were shown by Mrs. Ruth Lee. Here they are worn by Marye Jones, Mary Jean Files, Georgia Coats, Gladys Coffey and Mrs. Mary Sandidge. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Marye Jones, Mary Jean Files, Georgia Coats, Gladys Coffey, and Mary Sandidge, standing in North Side Elks for Beauty Shop Owners' tea
